docs.snippet: Sepp Blatter, the top official at FIFA, has signaled that he supports the controversial decision to move the 2022 World Cup in Qatar from the heat of summer to a cooler time of year....
docs.lead_paragraph: Sepp Blatter, the top official at FIFA, has signaled that he supports the controversial decision to move the 2022 World Cup in Qatar from the heat of summer to a cooler time of year.
docs.abstract: Debate increases as FIFA president Sepp Blatter signals that he supports controversial decision to reschedule 2022 World Cup in Qatar so that it will not take place in sweltering heat of summer.
